backend.package.json: Dependencies and scripts for Node.js/Express backend (e.g., express, mongoose, jsonwebtoken)
backend.server.js: Main Express server setup with MongoDB connection and JWT authentication
backend.models/User.js: Mongoose schema definition for User entity
backend.models/Task.js: Mongoose schema definition for Task entity
backend.controllers/userController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for User entity
backend.controllers/taskController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for Task entity
backend..env: Environment variables for configuration (e.g., MONGODB_URI, JWT_SECRET)

frontend.package.json: React dependencies including Zustand, Axios, Tailwind, React Router
frontend.public/index.html: Root HTML template with proper meta tags and favicon
frontend.src/main.jsx: React DOM root and app initialization
frontend.src/App.jsx: Main app component with routing and global state management
frontend.src/store/appStore.js: Zustand global state management for authentication and UI state
frontend.src/api/apiService.js: Axios configuration and API functions for CRUD operations
frontend.src/components/Header.jsx: Reusable Header component with navigation and user info
frontend.src/components/TaskList.jsx: Reusable Task List component for displaying tasks
frontend.src/components/TaskForm.jsx: Reusable Task Form component for adding and editing tasks
frontend.src/pages/Dashboard.jsx: Main page component for user's task list
frontend.src/hooks/useCustomHook.js: Custom React hooks for logic reuse (e.g., useAuth, useTasks)
